title: Integrated Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers: Subject Literacy and Prompt Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and basic GAI (Generative Artificial Intelligence) tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for graduate-level pre-service teachers to enhance competencies in interacting with generative AI during mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design effective prompts by utilizing the five elements (Background, Roles, Objectives, Key Results, Evolution) of the BROKE framework
Learners can holistically evaluate subject literacy (knowledge, application, evaluation, ethics) in the process of applying mathematical content to GAI tools
Participants can improve their instructional design based on quasi-experimental research design principles and analogous data collected over 8 weeks
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
